alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Magoffin; Morgan; Perry; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Morgan, northwestern Letcher, northeastern Leslie, Perry, Knott, northwestern Floyd, Breathitt, Magoffin and east central Wolfe Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Belknap to Smith Branch to Dalesburg. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dale, Press, Wilstacy, Flintville, Clayhole, Sikes, Lost Creek, Hager, Bays and Watts around 655 PM EDT. Eugene, Puncheon, Seiltz, Cornelia, Fritz, Hardshell, Ova, Stella, Barwick and Gullett around 700 PM EDT. Salyersville, Mason, Krypton, Foraker, Mosley Bend, Hendricks, Noble, Confluence, Toulouse and Chavies around 705 PM EDT. Carver Station, Carver, Buck, Tiptop, Conley Station, Swampton, Sublett, Royalton, Skaggs and West Royalton Station around 710 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Knott; Leslie; Letcher; Magoffin; Morgan; Perry; Wolfe
